alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Dewey; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 7:59PM CDT until August 11 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Custer County in western Oklahoma... Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 759 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oakwood to 6 miles southeast of Thomas to 4 miles southeast of Weatherford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Watonga, Hinton, Geary, Okeene, Thomas, Hydro, Canton, Hitchcock, Bridgeport, Greenfield, Oakwood, Eagle City, Fay, and Southard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Dewey; Washita
